links.*: Arda Reconstructed: The Creation of the Published Silmarillion

wikitext.*:
'''Breogán''' is a Galician artist. She provided illustrations for [[Douglas C. Kane]]'s ''[[Arda Reconstructed: The Creation of the Published Silmarillion]]''. 

The name Breogán is a pseudonym, taken from the [[wikipedia:Breogán|mythical Celtic king]] of the same name.
